titleBar.title: EVD Track
titleBar.search: Search by Name, Status, or ID

phoneLoginVerification.verificationCode: Please enter the 6-digit code sent to **{{phone}}**:
phoneLoginVerification.incorrectCodeBody: Please check that the code you entered is correct

addPatient.patientNotesPlaceholder: Will be shared with administration workers

patientDetails.patientNotesPlaceholder: Will be shared with administration workers

messages.chatPlaceholder: Enter a note to send to an administrator
messages.noPatient: Please save your patient details in order to start messaging with an administrator

photos.followUp:
**Follow-up:**
If this patient is determined to be positive for Ebola, or an administrator has questions, you will be contacted on this phone via voice, text, or a message below.
photos.nextSteps:
**Next steps:**

**Avoid contact with infected people.** In particular, caregivers should avoid contact with an infected person's body fluids and tissues, including blood, semen, vaginal secretions and saliva. People with Ebola or Marburg are most contagious in the later stages of the disease.

**Follow infection-control procedures.** If you're a health care worker, wear protective clothing, such as gloves, masks, gowns and eye shields. Keep infected people isolated from others. Dispose of needles and sterilize other instruments.
photos.noPhotoCaptured: No image on file - please upload a photo of patient's RDT strip
photos.note: **Note:** If this patient is determined to be positive for Ebola, you will be contacted by an administrator healthcare worker.
photos.instructions:
**Scanning instructions**

1. Place the test strip on a flat surface.

2. Hold the device steady and the app will take the photo for you.

3. If you're having trouble, try adjusting your lighting or moving the device.
photos.photoCaptured:
**Your image was scanned**

If the photo is good, please tap the "accept" button below and the app will analyze the test strip result.

photoCapture.error: There was an error capturing the photo, please try again

cameraPermissions.alertMsg: EVD Track needs access to your camera to record patient test results.
cameraPermissions.title: Camera Permission Required
cameraPermissions.why: We're sorry, but access to your device's camera is required. To continue, please update your device settings.

locationPermissions.alertMsg: EVD Track needs access to your location so it can accurately report patient data.
locationPermissions.title: Location Permission Required
locationPermissions.why: We're sorry, but access to your device's location is required. To continue, please update your device settings.
